title: Chintz, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (black, 2 reds, brown & purple) and dye applied by brush. Blue painted over a resist (chintz).
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 79 x 61 cm (31 1/8 x 24 in.)
Repeat H x W: 83.8 x 47.6 cm (33 x 18 3/4 in.)
description: Elaborate curving vine from which flowers spring. Small birds and insects.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (black, 2 reds, brown & purple) and dye applied by brush. Blue painted over a resist (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-69.
